## ProgramBuilder.matrixCompMult() method

Same as matrixCompMult builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL/WebGL2 device

**Signature:**

```typescript
matrixCompMult(x: PBShaderExp, y: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
